audio-support-msg: Oh no, your browser doesn't support audio!
select-invalid-query: Oops! No elements found. Consider changing the search query.
timeout-message: Please contact the researchers for a new submission link with an email to

permission-refresh: If you already changed permissions you need to refresh the page.
